about_the_game:
KAXUKI is a new UE5 FPS game that lets you fight your friends in a simple no-frills Deathmatch mode. Make a server, or join your friends to run around in our desert map and collect weapons from random pickups to annihilate your opponents!

LEARNING TO PLAY:

Our tutorial will greet you in the menu like and old friend. We'll show you the ropes and introduce you to all our different movements, and controls! Click on the highlighted tutorial button to get started!


THE ENVIRONMENT:

Welcome to our first map! The innocuous desert town! The three lane design and plentiful obstacles make it a joy to traverse. Strive to reach our 20 kill goal to steal victory from your opponents.


THE WEAPONS:

KAXUKI - HOPE OF PEACE gives you a small, but well detailed arsenal of weapons to destroy your enemies with.
Here's a quick introduction of our top three star weapons-

The M82 comes with a hefty 110 headshot damage, allowing it to kill in a single stroke, but its slow reload, small magazine, and excruciating ADS time make it a tough beast to master.

The AK47 is a good all-rounder. Dealing 30 damage per shot and eliminating in only four body shots. The recoil is tough, but if you can handle it, the high dps and large capacity will take you to victory.

The Deagle is our star pistol, with a huge, 12 round magazine, and 45 damage per shot. It shreds enemies and leaves nothing but dust in its wake.


ENJOY BOTH SOLO OR WITH FRIENDS:

Our P2P system lets you either join other player's servers, or create your own to play with friends! We've included a LAN mode to allow you to play only with friends you've invited over. And, as a welcome addition! Our game doesn't require you to be connected to the internet to start the game or play the tutorial, which will come as a relief to all of those with limited internet.

The M82 comes with a hefty 110 headshot damage, allowing it to kill in a single stroke, but its slow reload, small magazine, and excruciating ADS time make it a tough beast to master.

The AK47 is a good all-rounder. Dealing 30 damage per shot and eliminating in only four body shots. The recoil is tough, but if you can handle it, the high dps and large capacity will take you to victory.

And, as a welcome addition! Our game doesn't require you to be connected to the internet to start the game or play the tutorial, which will come as a relief to all of those with limited internet.
name: KAXUKI

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 10th Gen
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i9 10th Gen or Above
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060 or above.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: KAXUKI is a modern PvP First Person Shooter Game where each player tries to reach the highest level on the leaderboard. Multiple weapons are available within the game and players can battle against their friends or others as opponents online. Host servers, or join your friends!
